title: DISABILITY AND AGED CARE INSTALLATIONS
fullText:
Where the responsible organization has not nominated any patient areas, the installation shall be in accordance with AS/NZS 3000.
In New Zealand, a Type 1 10 mA portable RCD may be used to supply an item of medical equipment in residential areas.
NOTE:Guidance on the classification of medical procedures enabling the decisions made by the responsible organization in determining patient areas may be found in AS/NZS 2500.
